verblex: 1. To have an effect on your nose. English = smell.
2. To have an effect on your nose, especially when the effect is neutral or pleasant. English = (be) fragrant, (be) perfumed.
nomlex: 1. The effect that something has on your nose. English = smell.
2. The effect that something has on your nose, especially when the effect is neutral or pleasant. English = fragrance, perfume.
